channel.title: What do you think about the wii?
channel.description: What do you think about the wii? Do you like it, or dislike it? My opinion is that it is awesome! I am even using the internet on wii now. But the price of the games are 50 ea., it would be better if that wil be lower.

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Si Force:

Being honest, me and my brother had an accident with it and our TV ended up broken, so I am not the biggest fan of it. Although that’s life, sometimes accidents happen.

Haha, I love watching those videos on the internet. That’s what the wrist straps are for.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

Dislike.
Although, I own at Wii Tennis. ;D

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:16, topic:339088”]Wii got boring in 4 hours…

But the price of the games are 50 ea., it would be better if that wil be lower.

Games are a rip-off, which is why I installed a mod-chip in my Wii when I got it, so I don’t have to buy games. Now you don’t have to install any mod-chip or even burn any DVDs to play downloaded games on your Wii, you can just soft-mod it and load games from a hard drive.

60$ for 7 hours of entertainment is a ripoff, unless its a game that can be played online and is fun online.[/quote]

Many wii games can be played online, including downloaded ones on a modded console.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It’s a pretty decent console. I bought the Donkey Kong games from the store and finished all of those. I haven’t played an actual game on the Wii in quite awhile, but it’s a lot more entertaining when you have a friend play too.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

When you softmod, you can only backups of games.

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Oh yea, I forgot to metion I hacked my wii. I must say, adding texture packs to some games and being able to emulate others (includes gamecube) is pretty cool. Once your wii is hacked you can use cheats and stuff in the games

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Wii got boring in 4 hours…

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:339088”][quote author=xweetok599 link=topic=435468.msg3198014#msg3198014 date=1272999332]
But the price of the games are 50 ea., it would be better if that wil be lower.
[/quote]

Games are a rip-off, which is why I installed a mod-chip in my Wii when I got it, so I don’t have to buy games. Now you don’t have to install any mod-chip or even burn any DVDs to play downloaded games on your Wii, you can just soft-mod it and load games from a hard drive.[/quote]
60$ for 7 hours of entertainment is a ripoff, unless its a game that can be played online and is fun online.

Read full topic

xweetok599:

But the price of the games are 50 ea., it would be better if that wil be lower.

Games are a rip-off, which is why I installed a mod-chip in my Wii when I got it, so I don’t have to buy games. Now you don’t have to install any mod-chip or even burn any DVDs to play downloaded games on your Wii, you can just soft-mod it and load games from a hard drive.

item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I fucking hate it. Most the games are awful and I hate having to look like an idiot while playing any game. I would much rather come home and relax on my bed and play a game then having to jump up and down constantly. The only advantage is that it’s completely wireless, OH WAIT! Time to change your battery’s. There is no way to connect it to the console for constant gameplay without having to worry about your battery level.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @HitThisCity HitThisCity
item.description:
@HitThisCity wrote:

It’s a good party console. Definitely something to buy along with an Xbox 360, just so you don’t get bored out of your fucking mind.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I find wii great. Although the graphics and memory suck in comparison to 360 and PS3, I find it fun. Especially in CoD, where you can actually aim rather than use analog sticks the entire time.

But I must admit, I still want 360, it has a mic.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Id rather sit down then play. Even when im sitting it doesnt work so im like fuck it im gonna go play xbox360 with my friends

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I use it for the classics. I have Super mario world (the snes game with yoshi) Mario cart 64, LOZ OOT, LOZ original, Street fighter, Sonic 3, Original mario, mario 2 lost levels only in Japan, Mario 3 (with the raccoon suit and stuff) and LOZ 2.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

The only downside that I have noticed is in Sports game the quality is worse (more cartoonish). But I guess that is because there’s less space on the disk because of all the code for user interaction. I haven’t really played any other games besides sports game on the Wii, so correct me if I’m wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about the wii?

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:6, topic:339088”]Broke my T.V. with the controller playing bowling, I went to bowl and I threw the remote and hit my TV.[/quote]Meh, I knocked my sister out with my control.

item.title: What do you think about the wii?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:339088”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=435468.msg3198018#msg3198018 date=1272999524]

No you got to get up and do stuff, to much work.
[/quote]You can sit down and play. It’s just a motion sensor. (Just move arms, which I do anyway when playing with a controller)

Thats still to much work :(, anyways for real…I do like a bit but only to go to the WII store and get the classic games them are more fun then the WII games.[/quote]
Agreed I like the classic game’s where more.

Read full topic
